passage_text: Map: Australia. Australia's aged care workers have lodged a claim for a massive 60 per cent wage increase which they say is necessary to keep staff in the industry. The proposed pay rise would see wages lifted by up to $10 an hour and the application would also see changes to minimum staff-to-resident ratios.
